NEW_CHEST.TITLE: Let's create your new chest!
NEW_CHEST.DESCRIPTION:
This wizard will help you create a new chest.
You will be able to customize it to your liking and review it before creating it

REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Review your chest before creating it.

EDIT_CHEST.TITLE: Edit chest
EDIT_CHEST.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit the information of your chest.

OPEN_CHEST_MODAL.TITLE: Open chest
OPEN_CHEST_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Here you can open your chest and see its contents.
